00009 int headerNVR(Header h, const char **np, const char **vp, const char **rp)
00010 {
00011     int type;
00012     int count;
00013 
00014 /*@-boundswrite@*/
00015     if (np) {
00016         if (!(headerGetEntry(h, RPMTAG_NAME, &type, (void **) np, &count)
00017             && type == RPM_STRING_TYPE && count == 1))
00018                 *np = NULL;
00019     }
00020     if (vp) {

00024     }

00028                 *rp = NULL;
00029     }
00030 /*@=boundswrite@*/
00031     return 0;
